name: Poutine64
description:
Hello! Is it a game you're looking for? Cause i got one for y'all to try :). 

Make Quebec's food classic : Poutine! 

This is my first game with Godot.

Here is the ingredients:

  • Long fries, wedge fries, mashed fries
  • Regular cheese curd and vegan cheese (well .. other color cheese)
  • Gravy and vegan gravy
  • Peper, red thing ( some kind of hot peper maybe), mushroom

If you want to make one at home, its best if you can find cheese curd. Just mix fries, gravy and cheese curd. Then be wild with toping if you like.
